excelaccess.dumping.descriptor_openpyxl_wrapper module¶

@author: uidq3472

class excelaccess.dumping.descriptor_openpyxl_wrapper.OpenpyxlDeEx(excel_file_path, dump_path=None)[source]¶

Bases: excelaccess.dumping._descriptor_wrapper.DescriptorWrapper

Implementation of DescriptionWrapper with the openpyxl library.

Parameters:
  • excel_file_path (str) – a (relative) path to an Excel file
  • dump_path (str or None) – just used if a dump file is created

Returns:sheet object

Return type:list(openpyxl.worksheet)

excelaccess.dumping.excel_description_extractor module¶

@author: uidq3472

class excelaccess.dumping.excel_description_extractor.DescriptionExtractor(excel_file_path, dump_path=None)[source]¶

Central class for usage of DescriptionWrapper implementations. Determines which library to use according to excel file ending.

Parameters:
  • excel_file_path (str) – a (relative) path to an Excel file
  • dump_path (str or None) – just used if a dump file is created
